naslov: PRODAJA - KUĆA s 3 apartmana i dvorištem - ZADAR, BORIK (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - KUĆA s 3 apartmana i dvorištem - ZADAR, BORIK Prodajemo samostojeću kuću u Zadru na Boriku, izgrađenu na parceli površine 849m2. Kuća se nalazi uz cestu, okružena zelenilom. U blizini restorana, plaže, trgovina, autobusne stanice i ostalih bitnih sadržaja. Udaljena je 10min pješice od plaže u Diklu i plaže Borik. Sastoji se od podruma površine 44m2, prizemlja i prvoga kata. U prizemlju se nalazi stan površine 85m2 + terasa 50m2. Stan se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, blagovaonice i dnevnog boravka s izlazom na natkrivenu terasu, kuhinje, spremišta, spavaće sobe, kupaonice i tolatea. Također, u prizemlju se nalazi još jedan studio apartman površine 38m2 + terasa 10m2. Apartman se sastoji od kuhinje i blagovaonice, kupaonice i dnevnog boravka / sobe s izlazom na terasu. Na prvom katu je stan površine 120m2 + terasa površine 55m2. Stan se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, dnevnog boravka sa blagovaonicom i kuhinjom s izlazom na terasu, 2 kupaonice i 4 spavaće sobe od kojih jedna ima izlaz na balkon. Svaki stan ima odvojen ulaz. Kući također pripada i garaža površine 30m2. Ispred kuće je na raspolaganju i parking za 6 automobila. U prostranom dvorištu nalazi se i dio za druženje sa roštiljem okružen zelenilom. Grijanje i hlađenje je putem klima uređaja. Na prvom katu i u stanu u prizemlju postavljena je i peć na drva. Vlasništvo 1/1, bez tereta! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar FOR SALE - HOUSE with 3 APARTMENTS and GARDEN - ZADAR, BORIK We are selling a detached house in Zadar, located in Borik, built on a plot of 849m². The house is situated along the road, surrounded by greenery. It is in close proximity to restaurants, beaches, shops, bus stops, and other essential amenities. It is just a 10-minute walk to the beach in Diklo and the Borik beach. The property consists of a basement area of 44m², the ground floor, and the first floor. On the ground floor, there is an apartment of 85m² with a 50m² terrace. The apartment includes an entrance hall, dining area, and living room with access to a covered terrace, kitchen, pantry, bedroom, bathroom, and toilet. Additionally, on the ground floor, there is another studio apartment of 38m² with a 10m² terrace. The studio comprises a kitchen and dining area, bathroom, and a living room/bedroom with access to the terrace. On the first floor, there is an apartment of 120m² with a 55m² terrace. The apartment consists of an entrance hall, living room with dining area and kitchen with access to the terrace, 2 bathrooms, and 4 bedrooms, one of which has access to a balcony. Each apartment has a separate entrance. The property also includes a garage of 30m². In front of the house, there is parking space available for 6 cars. The spacious garden also features a recreational area with a barbecue, surrounded by greenery. The house is heated and cooled by air conditioning units. A wood stove is installed on the first floor and in the ground-floor apartment. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
